title: WPL 2024: Mumbai Indians Steal Victory From Delhi Capitals In Nail-Biting Opener
content:
The Women's Premier League 2024 kicked off with a bang as defending champions Mumbai Indians edged out Delhi Capitals in a thrilling last-ball finish. 

The Delhi Capitals, led by Meg Lanning, set a challenging target of 172 runs.  Alice Capsey  shined with a blistering 75 runs, while Jemimah Rodrigues provided valuable support.

Mumbai Indians, known for their chasing prowess, were off to a shaky start but found their footing thanks to Yastika Bhatia's composed 57 runs and Harmanpreet Kaur's quick-fire 55. The match went down to the wire with Mumbai needing 5 runs off the final delivery.  S Sajana stepped up, hitting a massive six to seal a dramatic victory. 

This nail-biting encounter showcased the intense competition and skill expected throughout the Womenâ€™s Premier League 2024 season.
author: Scroll Staff
